Key Match Events: Adam Zampa took 4 wickets for 25 runs
Mitchell Starc took 2 wickets for 43 runs
Pat Cummins took 2 wickets for 32 runs
Dilshan Madushanka took 3 wickets for 38 runs
David Warner was run out for 11 runs
Steve Smith was dismissed lbw for 11 runs
Kusal Mendis was dismissed lbw for 9 runs
Pathum Nissanka was run out for 61 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Australia's head-to-head advantage over Sri Lanka is 63 wins to 35 losses
Sri Lanka's new skipper Kusal Mendis called it right at the toss and elected to bat first
Sri Lanka received a blow leading into the game in the form of a quad injury to their skipper Dasun Shanaka
Post-Match Reflections: Australia improved to eighth on the World Cup standings with this win
Sri Lanka remains winless and with a mountain of work to do to stay in contention for a semi-final berth
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain did not interrupt the match as it was played to full 50 overs
Sri Lanka's openers Kusal Perera and Pathum Nissanka put on 125 runs for the first wicket
